title: Sitting Pretty
subtitle: No matter where you choose to lounge this summer, here are five combos for matching your beach chair and your bathing suit

components.text: No matter where you choose to lounge this summer, here are five combos for matching your beach chair and your bathing suit

caption.text:
Romantic Saint-Tropez
